title: Four Bedroom House for Sale in Thalawathugoda
details:
Meticulously maintained four bedroom house located in the secluded gated community of Eden Gardens. A well designed two story house facing a beautiful field. The house offers extensive living space along with a total of four bedrooms and four bathrooms.

The house is fully furnished and features a fully fitted pantry with all essential appliances. The master bedroom sits on the first floor, thoughtfully designed with plenty of closet space and a spacious master bathroom including a bathtub. Additionally there are two ensuite bedrooms on the 1st floor and a guest bedroom on the ground floor. A well configured, beautifully designed family house in an impressive locality.

- Four large bedrooms, four bathrooms. All bedrooms equipped with A/C.
- Spacious living & dining room.
- Landscaped front and rear garden.
- Solar powered water heating system.
- Separate maids bedroom and bathroom.
- Covered parking for one vehicle. Driveway allows parking for an additional vehicle within premises.
- Common facilities include 24-hour security, swimming pool, gymnasium as well squash, badminton and tennis courts.

Price negotiable upon inspection. Viewings can be arranged by prior appointment only.
